meeting_summary:
MEETING ANALYSIS SUMMARY
============================================================
Reference Date: 2026-01-10

ACTION ITEMS (5)
------------------------------------------------------------

[action_1] Create a rollout one-pager for support and sales.
  Owner: Emily (emily.carter@example.com)
  Deadline: 2026-01-16

[action_2] Review messaging once draft is ready.
  Owner: Isabella (isabella.moore@example.com)
  Deadline: None
  ⚠️  NEEDS REVIEW: [HIGH] Missing deadline makes it unclear when the review should occur.

[action_3] Define analytics events.
  Owner: Daniel (daniel.brown@example.com)
  Deadline: 2026-01-16

[action_4] Define analytics events if backend fields are known.
  Owner: Emma (emma.davis@example.com)
  Deadline: None
  ⚠️  NEEDS REVIEW: [HIGH] Missing deadline makes it unclear when the action should be completed.

[action_5] Conduct an initial security review.
  Owner: Henry (henry.thompson@example.com)
  Deadline: 2026-01-12


DECISIONS (1)
------------------------------------------------------------

[decision_1] Ship CSV export behind a feature flag.
  Made by: James


RISKS & OPEN QUESTIONS (3)
------------------------------------------------------------

[risk_1] Security review needed before enabling flag for all users.
  Category: risk
  Mentioned by: Henry

[risk_2] Do we need export limits?
  Category: open_question
  Mentioned by: William

[risk_3] Rate limiting might be needed.
  Category: risk
  Mentioned by: Sophia

action_items.description: Create a rollout one-pager for support and sales.
evidence: [03:45] Emily: We need a rollout one-pager for support and sales.
[04:10] James: Can someone own that by next Friday?

action_items.description: Review messaging once draft is ready.
evidence: [05:00] Isabella: I'll review messaging once draft is ready.
validation_notes: [HIGH] Missing deadline makes it unclear when the review should occur.

evidence: [05:30] Daniel: Analytics events should be defined by end of week.
validation_notes: [MEDIUM] Potential dependency on action_4, as defining analytics events may rely on backend fields being known.

action_items.description: Define analytics events if backend fields are known.
evidence: [06:00] Emma: I can define events if backend fields are known.
validation_notes: [HIGH] Missing deadline makes it unclear when the action should be completed.

evidence: [08:20] Henry: I'll do an initial pass next week.
validation_notes: [MEDIUM] Action_5's deadline is before action_1 and action_3, which may require their completion first.

decisions.description: Ship CSV export behind a feature flag.
evidence: [03:15] James: Decision: ship CSV export behind a feature flag.

risks.description: Security review needed before enabling flag for all users.
evidence: [07:00] Henry: Security review needed before enabling flag for all users.
[08:50] William: Do we need export limits?
[09:10] Sophia: Rate limiting might be needed.

follow_up_messages.subject: Follow-up: Your Action Items from Our Meeting
follow_up_messages.body:
Hi Emily,

I hope this message finds you well! I wanted to follow up on your action items from our recent meeting. Here’s a quick summary:

- **Create a rollout one-pager for support and sales**  
  **Deadline:** January 16, 2026  
  *[03:45] You mentioned the need for this, and James asked if someone could take ownership by next Friday.*

Please let me know if you have any questions or need any assistance as you work on this. I'm here to help!

Best regards,

[Your Name]  
[Your Position]  
[Your Contact Information]
